duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Director of Finance in building the financial structure of the company.
Assist with the monthly preparations of the income statement.
Analyze the General ledger expenses, identifying and understanding the variances between budget/forecast and recommending cost segregation movements if any.

Assist the Director of Finance in producing the monthly/quarterly/yearly forecasts and budgets using historical data, considering a normalized view of operations (1-off items that will not be a re-occurring expense).
Assist in forecasting finished goods model working with the relevant mid-senior personnel to ensure accuracy.
Assist in building scorecards/performance dashboards for finished goods. Use the results to provide directions on upcoming finished goods.
Support in weekly/bi-weekly/monthly reporting to departmental heads on P&L, stock aging, customer traffic, Store operation Analytics, etc.
Introduce new KPIs/reports for the business to help support business decisions.
Assist in the long-term planning for the business and building multi-scenario financial models.
Help drive impactful reporting, tools, and process improvement with a focus on data accuracy/integrity.
Work with mid-senior personnel to help collate and summarize information to understand the financial impacts to the business.
